description: DDM Holding AG engages in the acquisition and management of distressed asset portfolios. The company is headquartered in Zug, Zug and currently employs 65 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2014-08-05. The Company’s core business is the acquisition and management of distressed assets. The company offers financial services in fields such as capital recovery, including buying distressed assets; acquisition processes, comprising processes of acquisition implementation; consultancy services, involving acquisition know-how; and debtor treatment, containing cooperation with debt collecting companies, among others. Since 2007, the Company focuses on investment and management of distressed asset portfolios in Eastern Europe.
naicsSubsector: Securities, Commodity Contracts, and Other Financial Investments and Related Activities
name: DDM Holding AG
